1.0.name: wordpress/image-banner-widget
1.0.description:
This simple widget is intended for simplest use of image banners.

Add image banners in 3 steps:

  1. Just drag 'n drop the widget to your sidebar,
  2. Enter the image url and the link,
  3. Save & Close.
  4. It will fit to the container it is located in.
